definition: every two weeks, occurring twice a week, a periodical that is published twice a week or every two weeks (either 104 or 26 issues per year)
details:
adverb
- every two weeks
= synonyms: fortnightly
- twice a week
= synonyms: semiweekly
adjective
- occurring twice a week
= synonyms: semiweekly
- occurring every two weeks
= synonyms: fortnightly
noun
- a periodical that is published twice a week or every two weeks (either 104 or 26 issues per year)
